room_title: Escape room "Cold War Crisis" by American Escape Rooms in Orlando
review: This was my first Escape Room experience and I'm sad I waited so long to try one! The Cold War room was awesome!

room_title: Escape room "Cold War Crisis" by American Escape Rooms in Orlando
review: We had a good time doing Cold War Crisis. This was our first escape room and apparently we picked the hardest room. It was a little hairy at the end. We only used 3 clues and stopped the bomb with 11:52 left on our clock. We were told we were the best of the week. Can't wait to try another one.
